channel.title: Image Hosting API's
channel.description:
Does anyone know of any decent image hosting API's that allow you to upload files via Java and they simply return a URL?
Currently users playing [url=http://www.rscemulation.net]RSCEmulation[/url] can push F12 to save a screenshot of their client to their HDD. I want it to then upload the URL so can then simply paste the URL wherever they wish.
Any idea on what to use?

item.title: Image Hosting API's
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:2, topic:417306”]http://hc.apache.org/ + http://api.imgur.com/[/quote]http://api.imgur.com/examples

[code]// Creates Byte Array from picture
ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
ImageIO.write(imageToWrite, “png”, baos);
URL url = new URL(“http://api.imgur.com/2/upload”);

//encodes picture with Base64 and inserts api key
String data = URLEncoder.encode(“image”, “UTF-8”) + “=” + URLEncoder.encode(Base64.encode(baos.toByteArray()), “UTF-8”);
data += “&” + URLEncoder.encode(“key”, “UTF-8”) + “=” + URLEncoder.encode(YOUR_API_KEY, “UTF-8”);

// opens connection and sends data
URLConnection conn = url.openConnection();
conn.setDoOutput(true);
OutputStreamWriter wr = new OutputStreamWriter(conn.getOutputStream());
wr.write(data);
wr.flush();[/code]
